pages.text: Rather than the stock progression of looting Spirit Orbs from spawners and dungeon chests, both Heart Containers and Stamina Vessels are earned from various objectives throughout the modpack.$(br2)Also, to make them a much more enticing reward, the Stamina cap has been significantly raised and the Paraglider's speed has been buffed.

Heart Containers can be obtained by slaying any of the myriad bosses in Strange Journey for the first time, with some being given for slaying a collection of related minibosses. These can be tracked in the section titled 'The Endless Hunt'
Stamina Vessels can be obtained by exploring various dimensions, structures, and important biomes. These can be tracked in a section titled 'The Unending Journey'
